fulltext:
Nguyen Thi Kim Huong 
Personal info 
Address: 
District 10, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam  
Profile Summary 
I have 10+ years in database development and Core banking system operation. I am passionate with data 
and appreciate the hidden value behind it. 
I am highly adaptable database developer and can use many types of software such as Oracle PL/SQL, MS 
SQL Server and SAS Enterprise Guide. Above all, I have experience of business banking such as accounting, 
deposit, loan and foreign exchange. 
I am not only a highly efficient and hard-working Business Intelligence Specialist but also a good team spirit 
member and always keep oriented deadline from client requirements. 
Work experience 
FE Credit - VPBank 
Finance Company 
Limited 
Senior Insights and Complex Reporting Specialist - Business Intelligence 
Competency Center (BICC) 
11/2015 - present 
I am one of three key database programmers of Insights and Complex Reports team at 
Business Intelligence Competency Center (BICC) and key person develop and 
implement the reporting system of Circular 35 and Circular 11 to provide reports for the 
State Bank of Viet Nam (SBV). 
Cooperate with Finance Division to develop and implement the Asset Liability 
Management (ALM) Dashboard 
Deploy dashboards and reports for Finance, Card Center and Treasury 
Division of FE Credit, Internal/External Audit and SBV 
Lien Viet Post Joint 
Stock Commercial 
Bank 
Reporting Specialist 
01/2014 – 10/2015 
Involve in UAT of new banking services of Core Banking System before go-live 
Operate Core Banking System and support business users for using Core Banking 
System 
Develop, maintain and provide regular and ad-hoc reports for Local banks and State 
Bank of Vietnam 
Viet Nam 
Construction Bank 
IT Team Leader 
12/2007 – 01/2014 
Manage team to operate Core Banking System and support business users for using 
Core Banking System 
Propose test cases for team members to check new banking services before Core 
Banking System go-live 
Review scripts, procedure, functions, and triggers, packages before updating database 
and control errors of database 
Work experience 
Develop and implement the reporting system of Circular 13 and Circular 21 to provide 
reports for the State Bank of Viet Nam 
Develop, maintain and provide regular and ad-hoc reports for Local banks and State 
Bank of Vietnam
